00030 #define UPK_ERR_INIT
00031 
00032 #define CLEAR_UPK_ERROR \
00033     __upk_errno_type = 0
00034 
00035 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT(A,B) \
00036     do { CLEAR_UPK_ERROR; if(! (A)) { *((upk_errno_t *) &__upk_errno_type) = B; goto __upk_err_label; } } while(0)
00037 
00038 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT_MSG(A,B,...) \
00039     do { CLEAR_UPK_ERROR; if(! (A)) { *((upk_errno_t *) &__upk_errno_type) = B; memset((char *) __upk_err_buf,0,sizeof(__upk_err_buf)); snprintf((char *)__upk_err_buf, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN - 1, __VA_ARGS__); goto __upk_err_label; } } while(0)
00040

00042 #define IF_UPK_ERROR \
00043     __upk_err_label: \
00044     if(__upk_errno_type) upk_error("%s: %s\n", upk_strerror(__upk_errno_type), (*__upk_err_buf) ? (__upk_err_buf) : ""); \
00045     if(__upk_errno_type)

00146 #define _UPK_AS_STRING(A) #A
00147 #define UPK_AS_STRING(A) _UPK_AS_STRING(A)
00148 #define _UPK_DIAG_LOCATION __FILE__ ":" UPK_AS_STRING(__LINE__)
